name: Wizzard Survival
description:
A roguelike topdown game where you control a wizard who uses his powers to face spirits from the underworld

  •  Theme music :  Shadow Wisps  from album: Forest of Secrets
  • Buttons sound : Generic Button Metal Small 09 from BOOM GAME PACK – EPIC MEGAJAM
  • Font : DeadFontWalking-X2Ka
  • Icon images : RPG BUFF SKILL ICONS from craftpix.net and abilities-2 from randall-mackey
  • Load screen image : Will-O-Wisp from BanbooDoragon
  • Enemy skull 3d mesh : Hannya mask skull from Doink
